const image = await ethers.getContractAt("ImageNFT", "<imageNFT-address>")
const prompt = await ethers.getContractAt("PromptNFT", "<promptNFT-address>")
await factory.createAuction(3600, tokenId)
await image.approve("<auctionFactory-address>", tokenId)
const tokenId = await image.getTokenIdByCID("QmTestImage")
